chunk: Directions: Apply the Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream morning and evening to the eye contour and lips using its massaging tip.\\n\\nIn the morning, for an immediate congestion-relief and enhancing effect, use the tip like a brush: put the cream under the eye contour, smooth towards the outside then finish by tapping lightly.\\n\\nIn
book: 1148-Caudalie Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream
